title: A Serra
overview: Love moves mountains... When Fátima – a young woman from Serra da Estrela – meets Tomás – the son of a burel factory's owners – the connection between them is undeniable. However, Tomás is engaged to the girl who has been her rival since they were teenagers – Mariana – and is being blackmailed to stay away from Fátima because of her brother's (Artur) death.
